property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card whenever the Investigating player has played a card that allows him to search through his deck and add a card to his hand. As soon as he shows you the card, play this card. The card he added is removed from the game, along with this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card in the Bureau. Place ten tokens on this card. During your Briefing Phase you may take up to two tokens from this card and place them in your [RP] pool. The tokens become [RP] tokens. When all counters have been removed, discard this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to search through your Bureau Deck and add any one Equipment card to your hand. Show your opponent which card you have added. Discard this card and shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pick one Agent in the Team. That Agent is placed ten cards down, face up, in the owning player's Bureau deck. Any equipment that Agent had is discarded. When the Agent's card reaches the top of the deck, the Agent is immediately moved to the Hospital (undamaged). This card does not initiate Combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Force an opponent Team to make a COMPUTER 4+ skill check. If they fail, that opponent must tell you the next answer that they obtain regarding the X-File of your choice. The answer need not be a "yes" answer. Discard this card after you've obtained the answer.

property.name: Text
property.value: Search through your Bureau Deck and select an Agent with a Cost of 4 or less. Add this Agent to your team of Agents in the Bureau section. If this card is negated, remove it as well as the selected Agent from the game. During the Briefing Phase, pay X+1 [RP] upkeep or discard this card and the selected Agent.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Agent Krycek allows you to choose to add to the Conspiracy Pool instead of the Resource Pool during the Briefing Phase.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to examine any one Bluff card. Place Bluff card back on the Site after examining.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: [RP]s generated by Agent Mulder must be used to purchase cards. Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to play a Site for zero [RP] cost.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place a token on this card. Discard a token and look through your Bureau deck to draw any one Site that asks an AFFILIATION question. Add it to your hand. Reshuffle your Bureau Deck.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place 1 [RP] on this card. This [RP] may be used to pay for any Keyword MEDICAL or HEALING cards. If you use this [RP], replace it during your Briefing Phase. In addition, if Janus is in the Field Section, he may "heal" one point of damage on another Agent in his Team, once per turn. This may prevent an Agent from going to the Hospital.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Once per game, when Agent Lamana is part of a Team investigating a Site in the Investigation Phase, he may force his opponent to show the cards in his hand. Lamana may then steal any one card. He may use it immediately in the investigation. You must still pay for the card. Whether you use it or not, place it in its owner's Discard Pile at the end of the turn.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place 1 [RP] on this card. This [RP] may be used to pay for any Keyword BEHAVIORAL or OBSERVATION cards. If you use this [RP], replace it during your Briefing Phase.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: If one of your Agents is Abducted, you may immediately draw two cards.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place 1 [RP] on this card. This [RP] may be used to pay for any Keyword ALIEN INVESTIGATION or OCCULT INVESTIGATION cards. If you use this [RP], replace it during your Briefing Phase.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place 1 [RP] on this card. This [RP] may be used to pay for any Keyword COMPUTER or SCIENCES cards. If you use this [RP], replace it during your Briefing Phase.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place a token on this card. Discard this token and look through your Bureau deck to draw any one Site that asks a RESULT question. Add it to your hand. Reshuffle your Bureau Deck.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place 1 [RP] on this card. This [RP] may be used to pay for any Keyword EVIDENCE COLLECTION or SUBTERFUGE cards. If you use this [RP], replace it during your Briefing Phase.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place 1 [RP] on this card. This [RP] may be used to pay for any Keyword CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION or BUREAUCRACY cards. If you use this [RP], replace it during your Briefing Phase.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place a token on this card. Discard a token and look through your Bureau deck to draw any one Site that asks a METHOD question. Add it to your hand. Reshuffle your Bureau Deck.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place a token on Hosteen's card. Discard a token to examine your opponent's hand. Select any one Conspiracy card in your opponent's hand show it to your opponent. If your opponent plays that card at any time in the game, you may immediately ask one question about the X-File. This question may only be asked the first time the card is played.

card.name: Aleister Crowley High School, Milford Haven, NH

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION or one RESULT question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each source of damage affecting the Alien Bounty Hunter in CLOSE RANGE COMBAT also causes 1 damage to each opposing Team member involved in the Combat (because he has poisonous blood). The Hunter may use MARTIAL ARTS and SUBTERFUGE Combat cards. If killed in Combat, place the Hunter back in your deck and shuffle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Team about to investigate a Site with ALIEN INVESTIGATION as a prerequisite. Discard all cards assigned as Bluff cards at that Site. X = the number of Bluffs at the Site.

card.name: Alien Dna Steroid Program (project Purity Control)

property.name: Text
property.value: Negate any one Keyword EVENT card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any ALIEN combatant to reduce damage from all opponent LONG RANGE COMBAT or CLOSE RANGE COMBAT sources by 1 this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on any combatant with a SUBTERFUGE skill of 1+ or that is capable of using SUBTERFUGE cards. The opposing side's LONG RANGE COMBAT attack is negated this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the Team makes a BUREAUCRACY 4+ skill check, you may borrow any one of your opponent's Agents. It may not be an Agent you already control. Add the Agent to the Team for the remainder of the turn. Afterward, the Agent returns to the original owner's control. The Agent must be returned to the Team it belonged to or sent to the Hospital if the Agent was reduced to 0 HEALTH during a combat.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one METHOD question.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any Witness during your opponent's Investigation Phase. The Witness card is negated and removed from the game along with this card. To gain a permanent skill increase of +1 on an investigating team agent, place this card beneath the agent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to permanently add any one Agent from your hand to a Team. The normal rules for selecting an Agent still apply. In addition, the Agent may not be one that was removed from the game prior to playing this card. X = Agent's Cost.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Treat Assistant Director Skinner as a RES 3 if he is in the Bureau Section of the table.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any OCCULT Adversary to reduce damage from all opponent LONG RANGE COMBAT or CLOSE RANGE COMBAT sources by 1 this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Force an opponent Team to make a SUBTERFUGE 4+ skill check. If they are not successful, they automatically fail the skill check for the Site.

property.name: Text
property.value: Take a Witness from your Discard Pile and place it in your hand. In addition, if the Team makes a MEDICAL 4+ skill check, the Witness's modifier is doubled if played this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to negate any Keyword COMPUTER card.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question or one RESULT question. If you ask if the METHOD is "Threats", the skill check prerequisite is 4+.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Agent's SUBTERFUGE skill check. Alternately, any card that would send Fox Mulder to the Hospital may be negated by playing the Bill Mulder card. If played in this way, remove Bill Mulder from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill check.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's OBSERVATION skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play when you have just guessed incorrectly the identity of an X-File. Select a Team in your Bureau. If that Team successfully completes a BUREAUCRACY 4+ skill check, your opponent does not get to ask you a penalty question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on any combatant in a CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round to reduce the damage from any one source by four points. The combatant using this card does not deal damage in this CRC round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combatants that can use MARTIAL ARTS may use this card to negate two points of damage and still deal their normal damage in a CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any GOVERNMENT Adversary to reduce damage from all opponent LONG RANGE COMBAT or CLOSE RANGE COMBAT sources by one this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Team's COMPUTER skill check.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question.

card.name: Brother Martin Is Attracted To You

property.name: Text
property.value: This card does not initiate combat. Place three damage tokens on any Agent in the Investigating Team. The damaged Agent must be moved to the Hospital immediately and heals at half the normal rate. The Agent may not leave the Hospital until all damage is healed, and cannot be removed using other cards (Crash Cart, First Aid, etc.).

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's COMPUTER skill check.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Team of three or more Agents moving to the same Site. The Team may only send two Agents to that Site (owning player's choice). Any extra Agents remain in the Team but may not contribute their skills to any checks this turn. In addition, playing this card will prevent the use of the "Evasive Maneuver" card by this Team this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Agent may add his skills to a skill check that is occurring in another Section of the table. The Agent's skill is reduced by one (i.e.; Skill: 3 becomes Skill: 2). LONG RANGE COMBAT and CLOSE RANGE COMBAT may not be added.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one METHOD question. If you ask if the METHOD is "Possession", the skill check prerequisite is 4+.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION or one MOTIVE question. If you ask if the MOTIVE is "Security", the skill check prerequisite is 4+.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on any combatant that can use MARTIAL ARTS. The combatant applies a choke hold. If the combatant causes damage in CLOSE RANGE COMBAT then the damaged Adversary/Agent takes no further part in the combat.

card.name: Church Of The Red Museum, Delta Glen, WI

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one METHOD question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Basic Game Only: Apply a -2 modifier to any one skill check involving one of the following skills: OCCULT INVESTIGATION, BEHAVIORAL, BUREAUCRACY.Advanced Game: Pay the listed [CP] Cost, where X = the number of [CP] paid to gain the desired modifier to one of the following skills: OCCULT INVESTIGATION, BEHAVIORAL, BUREAUCRACY. (1) = -1, (3) = -2, (5) = -3, (9) = -4.

property.name: Text
property.value: Basic Game Only: Apply a -2 modifier to any one skill check involving one of the following skills: CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION, SUBTERFUGE, COMPUTER.Advanced Game: Pay the listed [CP] Cost, where X = the number of [CP] paid to gain the desired modifier to one of the following skills: CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION, SUBTERFUGE, COMPUTER. (1) = -1, (3) = -2, (5) = -3, (9) = -4.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on any Witness that has just been played. The owning player must shuffle the Witness back into their Bureau deck immediately and does not benefit from the Witness.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Negate any one Keyword SCIENCES card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Force an opponent Team to make a COMPUTER 4+ skill check or they will be unable to complete the skill check.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one RESULT question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on an Agent in the Bureau. The Agent is taken out of play for one full turn. At the start of the Briefing Phase of the second turn, the Agent may be deployed as normal, and in addition has a +1 in one of the following skills: CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION or EVIDENCE COLLECTION. Place this card below the Agent to remind you of the increased skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any GOVERNMENT Adversary to allow it to split the LONG RANGE COMBAT damage it causes amongst its opponents this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: The chosen Agent is the only one who may participate in the Combat. The Crew-Cut Man may use MARTIAL ARTS and SUBTERFUGE cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play after one of your Teams successfully investigates a Site with ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill as a prerequisite. Place this card in your Bureau. Discard this card to add 1 to an ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill check.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on an opponent Team in any Section. For the rest of the turn, that Team is considered to have a single Characteristic SITE Keyword (i.e., RESULT SITE). You may choose any one Characteristic for the Keyword.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unless a HEALING card is played immediately and the card results in one point being healed, move the Agent to the Hospital. The Agent must stay in the Hospital for the next turn.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one RESULT question. If you ask if the RESULT is "Manipulation Of Evidence", the skill check prerequisite is 4+.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Agent damaged by the Deadly Blur is placed in the Hospital for the next two turns regardless of how much HEALTH they have. Each opponent's LONG RANGE COMBAT and CLOSE RANGE COMBAT is reduced by one point. The Deadly Blur may use SUBTERFUGE Combat cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play when an Adversary is allowed to enter combat with a single Agent. If the Team to which the Agent is attached makes a SUBTERFUGE 4+ skill check, the Adversary is negated.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play during the Briefing Phase. One Team in the Bureau may make a BUREAUCRACY 4+ skill check. If successful, choose one Agent. The Agent now has a RES number equal to the Agent's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill during the next Briefing Phase. Place this card below the Agent to remind you of the increased skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Team that has just completed a combat. If the Team makes a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION 5+ skill check, then they may ask whether or not the Adversary has a Keyword that is the same as the AFFILIATION of the controller's X-File.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Team's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill check.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change one Keyword EVIDENCE COLLECTION, BEHAVIORAL, or CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION card to Keyword MOTIVE.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pay 1 [CP] to move up to 2 [RP] from your opponent's [RP] pool to your [CP] pool immediately.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Team's EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill check.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change a Site Prerequisite to BUREAUCRACY 3+.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to cause your opponent to discard two cards at random from his hand immediately.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adversaries that can use MARTIAL ARTS may play this card in a CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round to cause one Equipment card from the opposing side to be discarded. If the Equipment normally adds to CRC skill check, then it is discarded before it may do so.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card after a Team of Agents damages an Adversary in combat by dealing enough wounds to kill it. Place five tokens in the [RP] pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on any combatant in a LONG RANGE COMBAT round to reduce the damage from any one source by four points. The combatant using this card does not deal damage in this LRC round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's SCIENCES skill check.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change one Keyword EVIDENCE COLLECTION, MEDICAL, or CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION card to Keyword MOTIVE.

property.name: Text
property.value: Basic Game Only: Apply a -2 modifier to any one skill check involving one of the following skills: ALIEN INVESTIGATION, MEDICAL, SCIENCES.Advanced Game: Pay the listed [CP] Cost, where X = the number of [CP] paid to gain the desired modifier to one of the following skills: ALIEN INVESTIGATION, MEDICAL, SCIENCES. (1) = -1, (3) = -2, (5) = -3, (9) = -4.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place one token on this card. Discard a token to negate one OCCULT Adversary.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Team's SCIENCES skill check.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's BEHAVIORAL skill check once during your turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's MEDICAL skill check.

property.name: Text
property.value: Negate any one Keyword MEDICAL card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Team's MEDICAL skill check.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Team's BEHAVIORAL skill check.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Team in the Field during the Deployment Phase. If the Team makes a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION 5+ skill check, they may investigate two Sites in the same state this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Agents equipped with an Electron Emission Microscope have access to the field office crime lab. Adds 1 to the Agent's MEDICAL skill.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Team's OBSERVATION skill check.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any ALIEN or EVOLUTIONARY Adversary to add 3 to any LONG RANGE COMBAT skill check. If the Adversary does not have LRC skill, this card gives it a 3 for this round only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Force one opponent to discard one piece of equipment (your choice) that does not specifically modify LONG or CLOSE RANGE COMBAT.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question or one RESULT question. If you ask if the RESULT is "Abduction", the skill check prerequisite is 4+.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move any Bluff cards from one Site to another Site or back into the owner's hand. If at the end of an Investigation Phase a Site is left with no Bluffs attached, discard it. X = 1 [CP] per Bluff removed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Negate one Keyword EVIDENCE COLLECTION card.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the Team makes an OBSERVATION 4+ skill check, they gain a +1 to the Site skill check. Discard this card after you've used the modifier.

card.name: Excelsius Dei Convalescent Home, Worcester, MA

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one METHOD question. If you ask if the MOTIVE is "Security", the skill check prerequisite is 4+.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Team in the Bureau. If the Team makes a BUREAUCRACY 4+ skill check then you may search through your Bureau Deck and draw one Equipment card to add to your hand. Show the card to your opponents and then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on an Agent in the Bureau. The Agent is taken out of play for one full turn. At the start of the Briefing Phase of the second turn the Agent may be deployed as normal and in addition has a +1 in one of the following skills: OBSERVATION, BEHAVIORAL or SUBTERFUGE. Place this card below the Agent to remind you of the increased skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to cause one point of damage to every Agent in a Team for each [CP] Cost card discarded from your hand, up to a maximum of three points of damage. X = number of [CP] Cost cards discarded.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card does not initiate combat. Play this card in the Investigating Player's Hospital section. Place three tokens on this card. Remove one token in the Debriefing Phase of your opponent's turn. This card is discarded when the last token is removed. Agents may not heal as long as this card is in their Hospital section.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card during a LONG RANGE COMBAT round on a combatant you control with an LRC skill. That combatant and one other combatant of the owning player's choice will deal no damage in this LRC round.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one METHOD question. If you ask if the METHOD is "Manipulation", the skill check prerequisite is 4+.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any Adversary to add 1 to its CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill check. In addition, if the Adversary is OCCULT, play on the chosen Agent in combat to negate his combat skills this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any one combatant who would not normally be allowed to fight a round of LONG RANGE COMBAT. The combatant must still have LRC skill. The combatant may fight one round of LRC as normal.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on any combatant with a CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill of three or more to allow that combatant to attack twice in a CRC round.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the Team makes an EVIDENCE COLLECTION 4+ skill check, they gain a +1 to a Site skill check. Discard this card after you've used the modifier.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on one Team in the Field. If the Team makes an EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill check 5+, then they may add 2 to any Site skill check. Discard this card after you've used the modifier.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any Agent in the Field to immediately Heal one point of damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any EVOLUTIONARY Adversary to cause one point of damage to each opponent in a LONG RANGE COMBAT round. This is in addition to any other damage caused by the Adversary in this round.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card will negate one Event card played on your Team.

property.name: Text
property.value: Agents equipped with a Gas Chromatograph have access to the field office crime lab. Adds 1 to the Agent's SCIENCES skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's OBSERVATION skill check.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change one Keyword COMPUTER, SCIENCES, or SUBTERFUGE card to Keyword RESULT.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to the Agent's LONG RANGE COMBAT skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Damage caused by this creature may be split among all opponents (Directed Player's choice).

property.name: Text
property.value: Negate one Witness that modifies ALIEN INVESTIGATION or BUREAUCRACY skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Basic Game Only: Apply a -2 modifier to any one skill check involving one of the following skills: SCIENCES, EVIDENCE COLLECTION, BUREAUCRACY.Advanced Game: Pay the listed [CP] Cost, where X = the number of [CP] paid to gain the desired modifier to one of the following skills: SCIENCES, EVIDENCE COLLECTION, BUREAUCRACY. (1) = -1, (3) = -2, (5) = -3, (9) = -4.

property.name: Text
property.value: Force one opponent to discard all cards in their hand that contain the Keyword ALIEN INVESTIGATION or BUREAUCRACY.

property.name: Text
property.value: Force an opponent Team to make a SCIENCES 4+ skill check. If the Team fails, you may choose an opposing Agent on the Team to enter combat with any other Agent on the Team. Combat will only last one round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Select one card from your Discard Pile and place it in your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Negates the effects of any one Equipment card that adds to LONG RANGE COMBAT Skill for the duration of this combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this Witness to a Team. Enables your Agents to deal damage to OCCULT CREATUREs as normal. For example, you may use LRC against POLTERGEISTs and VAMPIREs. If at any time there are no Agents in the Team to which this card is attached, discard this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card in a CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round after damage has been dealt. If the Agents dealt two or more points more damage than their opponent, combat ends immediately. In addition, place the opposing Adversary in the Agents' Bureau section. The player may discard this card at any time to add two points of damage to any future combat involving an Adversary with the same Keywords.

property.name: Text
property.value: Add five tokens to your [RP] pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any combatant in a CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round. Add one to the combatant's damage result.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change one Keyword OCCULT INVESTIGATION, BEHAVIORAL, or OBSERVATION card to Keyword METHOD.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to force the Investigating player to discard all Keyword EVIDENCE COLLECTION cards in his hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Force the Team investigation a Site to discard one Equipment card of your choice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Take any Witness from your opponent's Discard Pile and use it for one skill check immediately at no cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play after an opponent Team successfully asks a Characteristic question. Force that opponent Team to make a SUBTERFUGE 4+ skill check. If they fail they must tell you the question and answer they obtained.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this on one combatant with a SUBTERFUGE skill of 1+ or that is capable of using SUBTERFUGE cards. No damage may be dealt to that combatant in this round and the combatant deals no damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to the Agent's OBSERVATION skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: One Agent equipped with a "Government Car" may use this card to make one CLOSE RANGE COMBAT attack at CRC skill: 6. Any damage allocated to the Agent is taken by the car first. The car is destroyed after taking six hits. Hits in excess of those needed to destroy the car are applied to the Agent. Discard the "Government Car" card after this combat round is resolved.

property.name: Text
property.value: Basic Game Only: Apply a -2 modifier to any one skill check involving one of the following skills: CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION, EVIDENCE COLLECTION, COMPUTER.Advanced Game: Pay the listed [CP] Cost, where X = the number of [CP] paid to gain the desired modifier to one of the following skills: CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION, EVIDENCE COLLECTION, COMPUTER. (1) = -1, (3) = -2, (5) = -3, (9) = -4.

property.name: Text
property.value: This piece of Equipment does not need to be attached to any Agent. Place three tokens on the Hospital Crash Cart. Discard one token to heal one point of damage to an Agent in the Hospital. Discard when all three tokens have been expended.

property.name: Text
property.value: The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on one Agent to allow that Agent to use their EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill number for any one ALIEN INVESTIGATION or OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one RESULT question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any OCCULT or EVOLUTIONARY Adversary to negate all damage allocated to that Adversary this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Team must make a BUREAUCRACY 4+ skill check. If successful, you may now have up to ten cards in hand at the end of your turn. This condition stays in effect until you are forced to discard this card. Discard this card if one of your Agents is moved from or to the Bureau Section of the table for any reason.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on an Agent in the Bureau. The Agent is taken out of play for one full turn. At the start of the Briefing Phase of the second turn, the Agent may be deployed as normal, and in addition has a +1 in one of the following skills: COMPUTER, MEDICAL, or SCIENCES. Place this card below the Agent to remind you of the increased skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Force one opposing Agent (your choice) to go to the Hospital immediately (undamaged).

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place a token on this card. Discard a token to move Agent Fox Mulder from anywhere on the table to the Team Phoebe Green is in. Mulder may assist in any skill check made by the team. In this manner, Mulder may assist on two Sites in one turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any Agent that has taken two or more points of damage from a single damage source. That Agent must go to the Hospital immediately and may no longer participate in the combat. The Agent may not leave the Hospital until he is fully healed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to add 2 [CP] to your pool immediately.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Team's OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check.

card.name: John Barnett Links You To Mulder

property.name: Text
property.value: This Adversary regenerates (Heals) two points of HEALTH at the beginning of each combat round as long as his HEALTH is not at zero.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Kevlar Vest will absorb three points of damage. Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to prevent one point of damage. Discard the Vest when all the tokens have been discarded. Excess damage is applied to the Agent as normal.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any Combatant that can use MARTIAL ARTS or any combatant opposing a stunned opponent. Add 2 to the combatant's CLOSE RANGE COMBAT damage result this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on a Team in the Field that plays a Witness. Discard the Witness card. The Witness actually becomes a lesser vampire that attacks the Team in conjunction with the master vampire, with a CLOSE RANGE COMBAT rating of 3 and a HEALTH rating of 3. LONG RANGE COMBAT will cause no damage to either vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on Agent Krycek when he is in the Field and is involved in a skill check. Krycek engages one of the Team's Agents (opponent's choice) in Combat. No other Agents may contribute skills to the combat. If Krycek sends the chosen Agent to the Hospital within two rounds of combat, then Krycek stays on the team, otherwise he is removed from play. While Krycek is affected by this card he is considered a GOVERNMENT, MASTER Adversary. Cards that would cause Krycek to be discard simply negate the combat.

card.name: Lake Okobogee, Campsite #53, Sioux City, IA

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Force one Bluff card attached to a Site to be discarded. If there are several Bluffs at the Site, the Bluff to be discarded must be chosen randomly.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to the Agent's COMPUTER skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to prevent one Agent assigned to a Site from contributing the Agent's skills to one skill check (your choice) that the Team makes this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card does not initiate combat. Flip the top card of the Investigating player's Bureau Deck. If it is a Witness card, then both Leonard and the Witness card are removed from the game. If not, then keep flipping until a Witness or 10 cards have been flipped. Flipped cards are placed on the owning player's discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's BEHAVIORAL skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to cause the Investigating player to discard X number of cards (chosen randomly) from his hand. X = [CP] cost paid.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fight Combat as normal except skip LONG RANGE COMBAT and go straight to CLOSE RANGE COMBAT. Agents must use their COMPUTER skill as their value in CRC. If an Agent has no COMPUTER skill, his value is 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to the Agent's SUBTERFUGE rating.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one METHOD question.

card.name: Lt. Brian Tillman, Aubrey Police Department

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place 1 [RP] on this card. This [RP] may be used to pay for any Keyword EQUIPMENT or COMBAT cards. If you use this [RP], replace it during your Briefing Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card after an Adversary sends any Agent to the Hospital or removes an Agent from the game. Place five tokens in your [CP] pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card at anytime during your turn to examine your opponent's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to the Agent's LONG RANGE COMBAT skill. Damage may be split if there are multiple opponents (your choice).

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds one to one Team's MEDICAL or SCIENCES skill check. This card may be played for zero [RP] and treated as a +4 to the appropriate skill if Agent Dana Scully is in the Hospital or if the Witness card Melissa Scully has been removed from the game.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one RESULT question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any Agent that has taken four or more points of damage from a single damage source. That Agent must go to the Hospital immediately and may no longer participate in the combat. The Agent may not leave the Hospital until fully healed. Subtract 4 from the Agent's Cost. If the result is zero or less, the Agent is removed from the game. (Agents Lamana, Willis, Purdue, and Weiss are immune to this effect).

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one RESULT question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to one Team's ALIEN INVESTIGATION skill check. Alternately, you may play this card when one of your Agents is the target of an abduction. Max Fenig is abducted instead. Discard Max Fenig. The abduction is negated.

property.name: Text
property.value: An agent with MEDICAL skill may use the Medi-Kit to heal one wound on any agent in the Team once per turn. The may prevent an Agent from going to the Hospital.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on an Agent in the Hospital. The Agent heals one token of damage immediately.

property.name: Text
property.value: Negate any one Keyword BEHAVIORAL card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds two to one Team's OCCULT INVESTIGATION or SUBTERFUGE skill check. Alternately, play this card when Agent Dana Scully is damaged in combat. Dana Scully takes no damage and Melissa Scully is damaged instead. Remove this card from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any OCCULT or EVOLUTIONARY Adversary to cause one Agent to allocate all damage to a target of the Adversary's choice this round (including other Agents).

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card during the case assignment phase to prevent your opponent from playing any adversaries at this Site.

property.name: Text
property.value: Subtract one point from each damaging hit caused by an OCCULT CREATURE. In addition, OCCULT Adversaries may not play combat cards on Agents equipped with a Mojo Bag.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds zero to one Team's ALIEN INVESTIGATION or BEHAVIORAL skill check. If this card is used in a successful Site investigation, the owning player may ask "Is your X-File's Affiliation Government?" in addition to the Site question for zero cost.

card.name: Mrs. Paddock, A.K.A. The Dark Angel

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to add five tokens to your [CP] pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any combatant that can use MARTIAL ARTS to add 2 to their CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill in this round. In addition, the opponent is considered "stunned" for the next round of combat. The opponent will deal no damage in the next round of combat.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one RESULT question. If you ask if the RESULT is "Insanity", the skill check prerequisite is 4+.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question.

property.name: Text
property.value: For the remainder of this turn, the Bureau is considered to have a single Characteristic SITE Keyword. You may choose any one Characteristic for the Keyword (i.e., RESULT SITE).

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to negate the effects of any combat card that ends combat. The Cost of this card is equal to the Cost of the opponent's card that ended the combat or 2 *P, whichever is greater.

card.name: Northeast Georgetown Medical Center, Washington, DC

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Briefing Phase, place one token on every Agent you control that normally starts with at least one token. This token is usable in the same way that starting tokens can be used.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one RESULT question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to search through your Bureau Deck and add any one Event card to your hand. Show your opponent which card you have added. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Damage caused by this creature may be split among all opponents (Directed Player's choice). The Blue Berets may use MARTIAL ARTS Combat cards.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Force an opponent Team to make a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION 5+ skill check or they will be unable to add their skills to a Site skill check this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Basic Game Only: Apply a -2 modifier to any one skill check involving one of the following skills: ALIEN INVESTIGATION, OBSERVATION, SUBTERFUGE.Advanced Game: Pay the listed [CP] Cost, where X = the number of [CP] paid to gain the desired modifier to one of the following skills: ALIEN INVESTIGATION, OBSERVATION, SUBTERFUGE. (1) = -1, (3) = -2, (5) = -3, (9) = -4.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to force your opponent to discard one Witness RESOURCE immediately.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change the Site Prerequisite to OBSERVATION 3+.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on a Team in the Field that plays a Witness. The Witness card is discarded and the Team is attacked! The Creature's LONG RANGE COMBAT and CLOSE RANGE COMBAT are equal to the Witness's modifier. If the Witness has no modifier, treat the Witness as a +3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Force an opposing Team to make a SCIENCES 4+ skill check. If they fail, each Agent takes one point of damage. If one of the Agents has a "Gas Chromatograph", then this card has no effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Poltergeist is unaffected by Combat attacks. It will attack for only one LONG RANGE COMBAT and one CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round and then is discarded.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to negate one Keyword CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION card.

property.name: Text
property.value: LONG RANGE COMBAT attacks cause only half damage (round up) to the Zombie.

property.name: Text
property.value: Increase a Site Prerequisite by one point (i.e., Prerequisite: Skill 5+ becomes Skill 6+). In addition, if the Team fails the skill check, each Agent on the Team takes one point of damage. If one of the Agents has a "Geiger Counter", this card has no effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any Team in the Field. If the Team makes an OCCULT INVESTIGATION 4+ skill check, they may take 2 [CP] from their opponent's Conspiracy Pool and add them to their Resource Pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play during the Briefing Phase to prevent one opponent from drawing any cards during the remainder of this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card next to the X-File you have chosen. Place ten tokens on this card. Beginning on your opponent's next turn you may take up to two tokens from this card and place them in your [CP] pool. The tokens become [CP] tokens. When all counters have been removed, discard this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to prevent the opposing player from drawing cards after the player has paid, but before the cards are drawn. X = The number of cards that the opposing player has paid to draw.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any PRIMORDIAL or OCCULT Adversary to add 1 to their CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play when one player has just asked a Characteristic question and you were not the Directed player. If the player achieved the prerequisite skill number exactly, then he must tell all opponents the answer to the Characteristic question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Negate one card with the Keyword MOVE.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Team in the Field during the Deployment Phase. If the Team makes a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION 6+ skill check they may investigate two Sites this turn. Resolve each Site individually.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on any Agent to immediately end combat for that Agent. Finish the combat without the Agent. The Agent takes no damage from the combat and may still contribute his skills to other skill checks.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combatants with a LONG RANGE COMBAT skill of 3+ may use this card to fight one additional round of LRC immediately.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on an Agent in the Bureau. The Agent is taken out of play for one full turn. At the start of the Briefing Phase of the second turn, the Agent may be deployed as normal and in addition has a +1 in one of the following skills: LRC, CRC or the ability to use MARTIAL ARTS Combat cards. Place this card below the Agent to remind you of the increased skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any Witness with a skill modifier to permanently add the Keywords EVENT and RESOURCE to the Witness. Thus, the Witness acts as an EVENT, RESOURCE card and remains in play. Place this card below the Witness to remind you of the effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's SUBTERFUGE skill check once per turn. You may have any number of Samantha Mulder cards in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Team in the Field that has just had an Agent removed from the game this turn. Make an OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check of 4+. If successful, the Agent remains in play.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one RESULT question.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Treat Section Chief Blevins as a RES 2 if he is in the Bureau Section. If he is in the Bureau Section, he may contribute to the Conspiracy Pool instead of the Resources Pool during the Briefing Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Negate any one Keyword SUBTERFUGE card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on any combatant in a LONG RANGE COMBAT round to add 2 points to that combatant's LRC skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Place three tokens on this card. Discard a token to add 2 to one Team's BUREAUCRACY skill check. You may discard a token once per turn. Discard this resource when all tokens have been discarded.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change a Site Prerequisite to SUBTERFUGE 3+.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill check.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 3 to the Agent's LONG RANGE COMBAT skill once per combat. Damage may be split if there are multiple opponents (your choice).

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any Team containing Agent Fox Mulder and/or Agent Dana Scully. Mulder must immediately be moved to the Bureau. Scully must immediately be moved to the Hospital (undamaged). Neither my contribute their skills to skill checks this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on one Agent to decrease the Agent's RES value by one. This card is removed when a Healing card is played on the Agent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's BUREAUCRACY skill check.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play whenever Assistant Director Walter Skinner is involved in a skill check. Skinner must go back to the Bureau (if he is not already there) and may not contribute his skills to any skill check this turn.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Team in the Bureau. If the Team makes a BUREAUCRACY 4+ skill check then designate a Team in the Field. As long as no new members are added to that Team, GOVERNMENT Adversaries may not attack that Team. This card remains in effect until a new Agent is added to the Team.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any EVOLUTIONARY Adversary to allow it to deal all of its damage in the round before its opponents. Any opponents sent to the Hospital as a result of this damage do not cause damage this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combatants that can use MARTIAL ARTS may play this card to add 3 to their CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Count the number of Adversary cards in the opposing Teams' discard pile. The Amarus Spirits' CLOSE RANGE COMBAT, LONG RANGE COMBAT, and HEALTH are equal to the number of Adversary cards in the discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any Team. If the Team makes a SUBTERFUGE 4+ skill check, it may use this card to immediately negate any one card that requires them to make a non-combat skill check.

property.name: Text
property.value: The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one RESULT question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Search through your Bureau Deck and place any one Witness card in your hand. Show the Witness to your opponents. Shuffle the Bureau Deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this on any opponent who has just taken damage. The opponent is considered "stunned" for the next round of combat. This opponent will deal no damage in the next round of combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Place on a Team in the Hospital containing an injured Agent. The Agent heals 2 damage immediately.

property.name: Text
property.value: Regardless of how much damage is done to this creature in the LONG RANGE COMBAT round, it will attack in the CLOSE RANGE COMBAT round. If its HEALTH has been exceeded, it is removed at the end of the CRC round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Have a Team make a COMPUTER 4+ skill check. If successful, draw three cards from your chosen opponent's Bureau deck and choose one to place in your Bureau Section face down. Place the other two cards back on top of your opponent's Bureau Deck in any order. You may use the chosen card when appropriate but you must pay the cost. Return the card to its owner's Discard Pile after it has been used. Leave this card on top of the card you've taken from your opponent to remind you that the card you took is considered an EVENT, RESOURCE.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Team that fails a Site skill check when combat was involved. If the Team makes a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION 3+ skill check, place the Site in the Bureau. At the start of your Briefing Phase, you may place the Site into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: OCCULT Adversaries may not assign damage to this Agent unless there are no other eligible targets. If the Agent is the only eligible target then the damage from OCCULT Adversaries is halved.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on any combatant to decrease damage from one LONG RANGE COMBAT source by two points this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to search through your Bureau Deck and add any one Adversary card to your hand. Show your opponent which card you have added. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to the Agent's BUREAUCRACY skill. GOVERNMENT Adversaries may now attack the Agent's Team when investigating a Site, even when they would otherwise be barred from doing so.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any Agent that has taken 5 or more damage from a single damage source. That Agent must go to the Hospital immediately and may no longer participate in the combat. The Agent cannot leave the Hospital until fully healed. Subtract 5 from the Agent's Cost. If the Cost is zero or less, the Agent is removed from the game. (Agents Lamana, Willis, Purdue and Weiss are immune to this effect.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Change any Keyword to any other Keyword on a card played by your opponent. This effect lasts until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to negate one Keyword EVIDENCE COLLECTION card.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card does not initiate combat. Play this card in conjunction with any other Adversary that initiates combat. The Adversary's LRC, CRC, and HEALTH are doubled.

property.name: Text
property.value: Place five tokens on any Agent that loses HEALTH as a result of this creature's attack. Remove a token in each of that Agent's Briefing Phases. At the end of the turn in which the last token is removed, the Agent is removed from the game. This card can be negated by the Team containing the afflicted Agent making a MEDICAL 3+ skill check or by playing a HEALING card on the afflicted player prior to the Agent being removed.

card.name: The Local Law Enforcement Are Uncooperative

property.name: Text
property.value: Negate one Keyword CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Agent wounded by the Manitou may not heal wounds until a Healing card is successfully played on him.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Mechanic may use MARTIAL ARTS and SUBTERFUGE Combat cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Basic Game Only: Apply a -2 modifier to any one skill check involving one of the following skills: MEDICAL, OBSERVATION, BEHAVIORAL.Advanced Game: Pay the listed [CP] Cost, where X = the number of [CP] paid to gain the desired modifier to one of the following skills: MEDICAL, OBSERVATION, BEHAVIORAL. (1) = -1, (3) = -2, (5) = -3, (9) = -4.

property.name: Text
property.value: Damage from LONG RANGE COMBAT may be split among all opponents (Directed Player's choice).

property.name: Text
property.value: The Creature has LONG RANGE COMBAT and CLOSE RANGE COMBAT equal to the highest Combat rating on the opposing team (including modifiers) +1. The Sandman may use SUBTERFUGE Combat cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Change one Keyword to any other one Keyword on a card played by your opponent.

card.name: The Vampire, A.K.A. The Unholy Spirit

property.name: Text
property.value: Play prior to a Site skill check. If the Site skill check is successful, place this card in your Bureau Section. You may discard this card in any of your investigation phases to add 2 to a Site skill check. Discard this card after you've used the modifier.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to allow you to exchange [CP] Pools with your opponent.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Team in the Field at the start of combat. Force the opponent Team to make an OBSERVATION 4+ skill check. If they fail, the following combat will be fought between the Adversary and one Agent of your choice. No other Agents may participate in the combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may move one of your Agents to any Section immediately. This card may not be played once an Adversary has forced combat until after the combat is resolved. The Agent may join any Team that occupies the new Section.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play when an Agent is forced to go to the Hospital. He must still go to the Hospital by the end of this turn but he may add his skills to one skill check before going.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Witness's modifier is now changed to a negative (e.g., a +1 becomes a -1). If the Witness has an ability separate from the modifier, this card cancels that ability for this turn.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to one Team's EVIDENCE COLLECTION skill check.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to any Agent in the Bureau. Discard this card to search your Bureau Deck and add any one Site card to your hand. Show your opponent which card you have added. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Force an opponent Team to make a SCIENCES 4+ skill check or the current player's turn ends immediately

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one RESULT question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Force the Team to make a SCIENCES 4+ skill check. If they fail, choose one Agent to go to the Hospital. The chosen Agent permanently loses one HEALTH. An Agent's permanent HEALTH can never be reduced below 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any PRIMORDIAL or OCCULT Adversary to add 2 to their CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 2 to the Agent's CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill.

card.name: Warren James Dupr, The Lazarus Man

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card when your opponent is about to assign damage. You now choose which of the Agents or Adversaries under your control take the damage. The damage may not be split unless you play a card that allows you to do so.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any PRIMORDIAL Adversary to add 1 to their CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill and prevent all damage from one opponent this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's SUBTERFUGE skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any Witness during your opponent's Investigation Phase. Pay X [CP] where X = the [RP] cost of the Witness. The Witness card is negated.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play when an Agent is forced to return to the Bureau. Prior to moving, the Team may make a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION 5+ skill check. If successful, the Agent does not have to return to the Bureau.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on an Agent in the Bureau. The Agent is taken out of play for one full turn. At the start of the Briefing Phase of the second turn, the Agent may be deployed as normal, and in addition has a +1 in one of the following skills: ALIEN INVESTIGATION, OCCULT INVESTIGATION, or SCIENCES. This card may not be played on Agents Mulder or Scully. Place this card below the Agent to remind you of the increased skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play after a Team investigates a Site to destroy one Event RESOURCE.
